jobDescription: We have partnered with a highly desirable and competitive facility right in the heart of historic Boston and beyond and are committed to delivering an experiencedRegistered Nurse - Med/Surg Telemetry for a 13-week contract starting ASAP. We also have other exciting opportunities for Med/Surg Tele nurses, so come for the Spring, stay for the summer, and fall in love with the Autumn in New England!Duties and responsibilities of theRegistered Nurse -Telemetry.To provide nursing care utilizing the steps of the nursing process to meet patient care needs.The responsibilities in this job description are reflective of the expectation that patient care is delivered in a manner that is appropriate to patient age, physical ability, and intellectual development.It is expected that patient care will be adapted to meet one or more of the following populations: a) adult, ages 14 to 64 years; b) geriatric, ages 65+ years.Requirements of theRegistered Nurse - Med/SurgTelemetry.Minimum 2 years of experience as a Registered Nurse and minimum 2 years of Telemetry experience requiredWilling to work 7p-7a shiftBLS , ACLS required.Active MA License-Note: If you are not licensed in MA and choose to apply for our state license we will reimburse you once you complete an assignment for us!
